description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 202302459 dated November 3, 2022 with a closing of February 24, 2023 at 2:00PM.",
full_summary:
# Government Tender: Radio Frequency Shielded Tent
## Tender Reference: cb-8063-54008242
### Solicitation Number: 202302459/B
### Tender Closing: September 25, 2023 at 5:00 PM

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a supplier to provide a Radio Frequency Shielded Tent. The tent is required for digital forensics examination purposes and must block all wireless connectivity to ensure the integrity of digital data.

**Tender Description:**

The RCMP's Digital Forensics Section requires a Radio Frequency Shielded Tent to safely and securely examine mobile devices. The tent must be capable of blocking all wireless connectivity to prevent data compromise.

**Key Deliverables:**

* The tent must be delivered on or before March 1, 2024.
* The supplier must ensure that all deliverables meet the requirements outlined in the attached tender documents.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The supplier's proposal will be evaluated based on the lowest price compliant with the tender requirements.

**Publication:**

This tender was published on August 14, 2023, and the tender closing date is September 25, 2023, at 5:00 PM.

**Attachments:**

The tender documents are available for download at [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8063/en_solicitation-202302459-b-radio-frequency-shielded-tent.pdf).

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the supplier must be registered in the Supplier Database of Public Services and Procurement Canada.

**Contracting Entity:**

The contracting entity is the RCMP, E Division.

**Procurement:**

This tender is being conducted through a competitive bidding process.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Gursharn Dhadwal at (778) 290-2774 or [gursharn.dhadwal@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:gursharn.dhadwal@rcmp-grc.gc.ca).

Note: I made some minor changes to the format to make it more readable. I also removed some of the unnecessary information and kept only the relevant details. Let me know if you need any further assistance!
